item.title: codeanywhere
item.description: xhs Container HTML5 Development Stack with Apache (running on port 3000), Node.js and npm preinstalled. This Codeanywhere Container comes with: 2GB of Disc Storage 256MB RAM (+ 512 MB swap) Sudo access SSH access on host11.codeanyhost.com -p 20143 Access to all HTTP and Websocket ports The operating system running on this Container is Centos 7.2. Linux distributon (64 bit). CentOS uses the Yellowdog Updater, Modified (YUM) for updates, package and dependency management.
